fields.text: Welcome to KBC Staffing in the East Bay offering temporary, temp to perm, and direct hire staffing solutions.
If you are seeking job opportunities, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a temporary staffing specialist.
For temp-to-perm and direct hire positions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a recruitment consultant for temp to perm and direct hire opportunities.
If you are an employer seeking staffing solutions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with an employer services representative for temporary staffing.
For temp-to-perm and direct hire solutions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with an employer services representative for permanent and temp to perm placements.
